tools.name: CodeWhisperer

pricing.tier: Paid tiers with increased usage and features

user_feedback: I used CodeWhisperer to generate the code for a complex algorithm, and it saved me a lot of time. The AI was very accurate and helped me avoid errors.
The AI suggestions in CodeWhisperer were sometimes too general and didn't fit my specific use case.

tools.name: GitHub Copilot

pricing.tier: Paid plans with additional features and priority support

user_feedback: GitHub Copilot has saved me a lot of time by suggesting code snippets and completing my code automatically. It's definitely worth using.
The AI-powered suggestions in GitHub Copilot can sometimes be inaccurate or irrelevant, which can be frustrating.
